text: The voiced velar nasal is a type of consonant. The letter for this sound in the International Phonetic Alphabet is ⟨⟩. The X-SAMPA symbol for this sound is `⟨N⟩`. The English language has this sound. It is the sound represented by ng in walking and angst. == Features == == Examples == Language Language Word IPA Meaning Albanian Albanian 'because' Aleut Aleut 'five' Arabic Hejazi /mingal 'brazier' Armenian Eastern /ënker 'friend' Assamese Assamese /ŗông 'color' Bambara Bambara 'guitar' Bashkir 'one thousand' Basque Basque 'leg' Bengali Bengali /rông 'color' Bulgarian Bulgarian /tănko 'thin' Catalan Catalan 'blood' Chamorro Chamorro 'duck' Chinese Cantonese /ngong4 'raise' Chinese Eastern Min 疑/ngi 'suspect' Chinese Gan 牙/nga 'tooth' Chinese Hakka 我/ngai 'I' Chinese Mandarin /beijing 'Beijing' Chinese Northern Min 外/ngui 'outside' Chinese Southern Min 黃/ng 'yellow' Chinese Sichuanese 我/ngo 'I' Chinese Wu 五/ng 'five' Chinese Xiang 熬/ngau 'to boil' Chinese Yuci dialect of Jin 我/ngie 'I' Chukchi Chukchi ңыроқ/ṇyroq 'three' Czech Czech 'tank' Dinka Dinka 'who' Danish Danish 'song' Dutch Dutch 'fear' English English 'sing' Faroese Faroese 'meadow' Fijian Fijian 'child' Filipino Filipino 'now' Finnish Finnish 'cloth' French Standard 'camping' French Southern France 'bread' Galician Galician 'one' (f.)
